item.title: Homeopathy
item.description: What Is Homeopathy? Homeopathy is a natural therapy that uses homeopathic remedies/medicines. Its story started over two hundred years ago when a German doctor/chemist Samuel Hahneman wanted to find a more gentle way of healing than the brutal treatments of his day. Today’s patients are also drawn to homeopathy because of its natural, gentle nature. When you visit a homeopath you will see that they give you a lot of time and space to express your health issues, emotions or whatever brings you to them.

item.title: Get Started
item.description: If you have not yet taken the decision to see a homeopath, maybe you can start to use homeopathic remedies for some simple acute conditions. This ,for a lot of people is their first introduction to the world of Homeopathy. Most people will have heard of Arnica , the most famous homeopathic remedy for injuries and bruising. Many surgeons now tell their patients to take Arnica after surgery Here is a list of some common remedies to use in acute situations:

item.title: Contact
